mapper.insert: insert into t_user (user_ID, user_Name, role_ID, user_RealName, user_Password, salt, last_LoginTime, last_LoginIp, del_Flag, last_SubTime) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userRealname,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastLogintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastLoginip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{lastSubtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.select: select user_ID, user_Name, role_ID, user_RealName, user_Password, salt, last_LoginTime, last_LoginIp, del_Flag, last_SubTime from t_user where user_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
